title: Add a variable to mass email
content: Hi community, how do I add a variable for First Name and Phone Number fields to the body of a mail merge email in Thunderbird? Thank you in advance for your support.
creator: matt236

title: Bulk folder always go back to the trash folder
content:
Hello, my Yahoo account has the spam folder (bulk) but in TB it is located in the Trash folder, and despite returning it to its original destination from the profile folder it is automatically returned to the trash folder.

Pls help
creator: erik.astudillo

title: Address book empty, no sent emails
content: After updating my Ubuntu operating system, Thunderbird no long has my sent emails or my local folders and my address book is empty. I have 3 months of emails in my inbox, but hundreds of previous ones are gone. I had not backed them up. I use POP, is there anyway I can get them back?
creator: patti.shrake

title: Inbox-1 and  Inbox-2 and Inbox-3 and Inbox-4 and Inbox-5 ...etc
content:
Hello, since switching to the ESR version I keep getting new inbox folders Mail system: pop3 - mail database approx. 20 GB in size

Example: inbox-1 inbox-2 inbox-3 inbox-4 inbox-5 inbox-6 inbox-7 inbox-8 inbox-9 ..

I'm currently at inbox-28.

The content is similar to the main inbox but only contains parts of it. The size of the mail database is constantly growing as a result.
creator: ludwig26

title: Thunderbird
content: Good morning, I installed Thunderbird - 128.3.2 - on a new computer with windows 11 PRO 64bit. My email is - carlofarioli@hotmail.com - the problem is that only the INBOX and TRASH folders appear. I can't find the SUBSCRIBE function to activate all the missing folders. On the old computer with windows10 PRO, Tunderbird 115.5.0 is installed and everything works fine... Can you help me solve the problem, thanks
creator: carlofarioli
